<!-- Please do not add weblinks or examples which do not have Wikipedia articles (The entries are in alphabetical order within each category.) --> {{pp-semi-indef}} {{mergefrom|List of semantic search engines|date=May 2012}} This is a list of articles about '''search engines''', including [[web search engine]]s, [[selection-based search]] engines, [[metasearch engine]]s, [[desktop search]] tools, and [[web portal]]s and [[vertical market]] websites that have a search facility for [[online database]]s.
== By content/topic == === General ===
<!-- Please do not add weblinks or examples which do not have Wikipedia articles --> * [[Baidu]] (Chinese, Japanese) * [[Bing]] * [[Blekko]] * [[DuckDuckGo]] * [[Google Search|Google]] * [[Sogou]] (Chinese) * [[Soso.com]] (Chinese) * [[Volunia]] * [[Yahoo! Search|Yahoo!]] * [[Yandex Search|Yandex]] * [[Yodao]] (Chinese)
====P2P search engines==== * [[FAROO]] * [[Seeks]] (Open Source) * [[YaCy]] (Free and fully decentralized)
=== Metasearch engines ===
<!-- Please do not add weblinks or examples which do not have Wikipedia articles --> {{See also|Metasearch engine}} * [[Blingo]] * [[Yippy]] (formerly Clusty) * [[DeeperWeb]] * [[Dogpile]] * [[Excite]] * [[Harvester42]] * [[HotBot]] * [[Info.com]] * [[Ixquick]] * [[Kayak.com|Kayak]] * [[Mamma.com|Mamma]] * [[Metacrawler]] * [[Mobissimo]] * [[Otalo.com|Otalo]] * [[Publisher's clearinghouse#Online development|PCH Search and Win]] * [[SideStep]] * [[Thiv]] * [[WebCrawler]]
=== Geographically limited scope ===
<!-- Please do not add weblinks or examples which do not have Wikipedia articles --> * [[Accoona]], [[China]]/[[United States]] * [[Alleba]], Philippines * [[Ansearch]], [[Australia]]/[[United States]]/[[United Kingdom]]/[[New Zealand]] * [[Biglobe]], [[Japan]] * [[Daum Communications|Daum]], [[Korea]] * [[Goo (search engine)|Goo]], [[Japan]] * [[Guruji.com]], [[India]] * [[Leit.is]], [[Iceland]] * [[Maktoob]], [[Arab World]] * [[Miner.hu]], [[Hungary]] * [[Najdi.si]], [[Slovenia]] * [[Naver]], [[Korea]] * [[Onkosh]], [[Arab World]] * [[Rambler (portal)|Rambler]], [[Russia]] * [[Rediff]], [[India]] * [[SAPO (company)|SAPO]], [[Portugal]]/[[Angola]]/[[Cabo Verde]]/[[Mozambique]] * [[Search.ch]], [[Switzerland]] * [[Sesam]], [[Norway]], [[Sweden]] * [[Seznam]], [[Czech Republic]] * [[Walla!]], [[Israel]] * [[Yandex|Yandex.ru]], [[Russia]]/[[Turkey]] * [[Yehey!]], Philippines * [[ZipLocal]], [[Canada]]/[[United States]]
=== Accountancy ===
<!-- Please do not add weblinks or examples which do not have Wikipedia articles --> * [[IFACnet]]
=== Business ===
<!-- Please do not add weblinks or examples which do not have Wikipedia articles --> * [[Business.com]] * [[Getit Infoservices Private Limited]] * [[GenieKnows]] (United States and [[Canada]]) * [[GlobalSpec]] * [[LexisNexis|Nexis (Lexis Nexis)]] * [[Thomasnet]] ([[United States]]) * [[Justdial]]
=== Enterprise === {{see also|Enterprise search}} * [[Funnelback]]: Funnelback Search * [[Jumper 2.0]]: Universal search powered by [[Enterprise bookmarking]] * [[Oracle Corporation]]: Secure Enterprise Search 10g * [[Q-Sensei]]: Q-Sensei Enterprise * [[TeraText]]: TeraText Suite
=== Fashion === * [[Fashion Net]]
=== Food/Recipes === * [[RecipeBridge]]: [[vertical search]] engine for [[recipe]]s * [[Yummly]]: semantic recipe search
=== Mobile/Handheld ===
* [[Taganode Local Search Engine]] * [[Taptu]]: taptu mobile/social search
=== Job ===
<!-- Please do not add weblinks or examples which do not have Wikipedia articles --> <!-- Please add in alphabetical order --> {{main|Job search engine}}
* [[Bixee.com]] (India) * [[CareerBuilder.com]] (USA) * [[Craigslist]] (by city) * [[Dice.com]] (USA) * [[Eluta.ca]] (Canada) * [[Hotjobs.com]] (USA) * [[Incruit]] (Korea) * [[Indeed.com]] (USA) * [[LinkUp (website)|LinkUp.com]] (USA) * [[Monster.com]] (USA), (India) * [[Naukri.com]] (India) * [[Yahoo! HotJobs]] (Countrywise subdomains, International)
=== Legal ===
<!-- Please do not add weblinks or examples which do not have Wikipedia articles --> * [[Google Scholar]] * [[LexisNexis|Lexis (Lexis Nexis)]] <!-- * [[Fastcase]] --> * [[Manupatra]] * [[Quicklaw]] * [[WestLaw]]
=== Medical ===
<!-- Please do not add weblinks or examples which do not have Wikipedia articles --> * [[Bing Health]] * [[Bioinformatic Harvester]] * [[EB-eye]] EMBL-EBI's Search engine * [[Entrez]] (includes [[Pubmed]]) * [[GenieKnows]] * [[GoPubMed]] (knowledge-based: GO - GeneOntology and MeSH - Medical Subject Headings) * [[Healia]] * [[Healthline]] * [[Nextbio]] (Life Science Search Engine) * [[PubGene]] * [[Quertle]] (Semantic search of the biomedical literature) * [[Searchmedica]] * [[WebMD]]
=== News ===
<!-- Please do not add weblinks or examples which do not have Wikipedia articles --> * [[Bing News]] * [[Daylife]] * [[Google News]] * [[MagPortal]] * [[Newslookup]] * [[Nexis|Nexis (Lexis Nexis)]] * [[Topix.net]] * [[Trapit]] * [[Yahoo! News]]
=== People ===
<!-- Please do not add weblinks or examples which do not have Wikipedia articles --> * [[Comfibook]] * [[Ex.plode.us]] * [[InfoSpace]] * [[PeekYou]] * [[Spock (website)|Spock]] * [[Spokeo]] * [[Wink Technologies|Wink]] * [[Worldwide Helpers]] * [[Zabasearch.com]] * [[ZoomInfo]]
=== Real estate / property ===
<!-- Please do not add weblinks or examples which do not have Wikipedia articles --> * [[Fizber.com]] * [[HotPads.com]] * [[Realtor.com]] * [[Redfin]] * [[Rightmove]] * [[Zillow.com]]
=== Television ===
<!-- Please do not add weblinks or examples which do not have Wikipedia articles --> *[[TV Genius]]
=== Video Games ===
* [[Wazap]] (Japan)
== By information type ==
Search engines dedicated to a specific kind of information
=== Forum ===
<!-- Please do not add weblinks or examples which do not have Wikipedia articles --> * [[Omgili]]
=== Blog ===
<!-- Please do not add weblinks or examples which do not have Wikipedia articles --> * [[Amatomu]] * [[Bloglines]] * [[BlogScope]] * [[IceRocket]] * [[Regator]] * [[Technorati]]
=== Multimedia ===
<!-- Please do not add weblinks or examples which do not have Wikipedia articles --> {{see also|Multimedia search}} * [[Bing Videos]] * [[blinkx]] * [[FindSounds]] * [[Google Video]] * [[Munax]]'s PlayAudioVideo * [[Picsearch]] * [[Pixsta]] * [[Podscope]] * [[ScienceStage]] * [[SeeqPod]] * [[Songza]] * [[TinEye]] * [[TV Genius]] * [[Veveo]] * [[Yahoo! Video]] * [[YouTube]]
=== Source code ===
<!-- Please do not add weblinks or examples which do not have Wikipedia articles --> * [[Google Code Search]] * [[JExamples]] * [[Koders]] * [[Krugle]]
=== BitTorrent ===
These search engines work across the [[BitTorrent (protocol)|BitTorrent protocol]]. <!-- Please do not add weblinks or examples which do not have Wikipedia articles --> * [[FlixFlux]] * [[Isohunt]] * [[Mininova]] * [[The Pirate Bay]] * [[TorrentSpy]] * [[Torrentz]]
=== Cloud ===
Search engines listed below find various types of files that have been stored in [[cloud storage|the cloud]] and made publicly available. <!-- Please do not add weblinks or examples which do not have Wikipedia articles --> * [[Open Drive]]
=== Email ===
<!-- Please do not add weblinks or examples which do not have Wikipedia articles --> * [[Lookeen]] * [[TEK search engine|TEK]]
=== Maps ===
<!-- Please do not add weblinks or examples which do not have Wikipedia articles --> * [[Bing Maps]] * [[Géoportail]] * [[Google Maps]] * [[MapQuest]] * [[Nokia_Maps]] * [[OpenStreetMap]] * [[WikiMapia]] * [[Yahoo! Maps]]
=== Price ===
<!-- These are systems to retrieve shopping information documents --> * [[Bing Shopping]] * [[Google Shopping]] (formerly Google Product Search and Froogle) * [[Kelkoo]] * [[MySimon]] * [[PriceGrabber]] * [[PriceRunner]] * [[PriceSCAN]] * [[Pronto.com]] * [[Shopping.com]] * [[ShopWiki]] * [[Shopzilla]] <small>(also operates [[Bizrate]])</small> * [[SwoopThat.com]] * [[TheFind.com]] * [[Wishabi]]
=== Question and answer === <!-- Please do not add weblinks or examples which do not have Wikipedia articles -->
==== Human answers ====
* [[Answers.com]] * [[Ask Me Help Desk]] * [[DeeperWeb]] * [[eHow]] <!--Live Search Q&A no longer exists--> * [[Quora]] * [[Stack Overflow (website)|Stack Overflow]]/[[Stack Exchange Network]] * [[Uclue]] * [[wikiHow]] * [[Yahoo! Answers]]
==== Automatic answers ====
{{see also|Question answering}}
* [[AskMeNow]] * [[BrainBoost]] * [[True Knowledge]] * [[Wolfram Alpha]]
=== Natural language ===
{{see also|Natural language search engine|Semantic search}}
* [[Ask.com]] * [[Bing]] (Semantic ability is powered by Powerset) * [[hakia]] * [[Lexxe]]
== By model ==
===Privacy search engines=== * [[DuckDuckGo]] * [[Ixquick]]
=== Open source search engines ===
<!-- Please do not add weblinks or examples which do not have Wikipedia articles --> * [[DataparkSearch]] * [[Grub (search engine)|Grub]] * [[Ht-//dig|ht://Dig]] * [[Isearch]] * [[Lemur Toolkit & Indri Search Engine]] * [[Lucene]] * [[mnoGoSearch]] * [[Namazu (search engine)|Namazu]] * [[Nutch]] * [[Recoll]] * [[Sciencenet]] (for scientific knowledge, based on [[YaCy]] technology) * [[Seeks]] * [[Sphinx (search engine)|Sphinx]] * [[SWISH-E]] * [[Terrier Search Engine]] * [[Wikia Search]] (defunct) * [[Xapian]] * [[YaCy]] * [[Zettair]]
=== Semantic browsing engines ===
<!-- Please do not add weblinks or examples which do not have Wikipedia articles --> * [[Hakia]] * [[Yebol]]
=== Social search engines ===
<!-- Please do not add weblinks or examples which do not have Wikipedia articles --> {{see also|Social search|Relevance feedback|Human search engine}} * [[ChaCha Search]] * [[Delver (Social Search)|Delver]] * [[Eurekster]] * [[Mahalo.com]] * [[OneRiot]] * [[Rollyo]] * [[SearchTeam]] * [[Sproose]] * [[Trexy]] * [[Wink Technologies|Wink]] provides web search by analyzing user contributions such as bookmarks and feedback
=== Visual search engines === {{See also|Visual search engine}} <!-- Please do not add weblinks or examples which do not have Wikipedia articles --> * [[ChunkIt!]] * [[Grokker]] * [[Pixsta]] * [[PubGene]] * [[TinEye]] * [[Viewzi]] * [[Macroglossa_Visual_Search|Macroglossa]]
=== Search appliances ===
{{see also|Search appliance}} * [[Google Search Appliance]] * [[Fabasoft]] * [[Searchdaimon]] * [[Thunderstone Software LLC.|Thunderstone]]
<!-- ===Hosted Services=== -->
<!-- *Blossom: Blossom Enterprise Search --> <!-- *[[VisualSciences]]: Search -->
=== Desktop search engines ===
<!-- Please do not add weblinks or examples which do not have Wikipedia articles --> {{see also|Desktop search}}
{|class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align=left;" !width="15%"|Name !width="15%"|Platform !width="55%"|Remarks !width="15%"|License |- | [[Autonomy (software)|Autonomy]] | [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]] | IDOL Enterprise Desktop Search. | Proprietary, commercial |- | [[Beagle (software)|Beagle]] | [[Linux]] | Open source desktop search tool for Linux based on Lucene. Unmaintained since 2009. | A mix of the [[X11/MIT License]] and the [[Apache License]] |- | [[Copernic Desktop Search]] | [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]] | <!-- Can we remove this? It is not a relevant "remark" and the cited study is no longer available. See http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Talk:Desktop_search#The_article_does_not_educate_the_reader_and_needs_to_be_rewritten
Considered best overall search engine in 2005 UW benchmark study.<ref>{{cite web | url = http://www.uwebi.org/reports/desktop_search.pdf | title = Benchmark Study of Desktop Search Tools | accessdate = 2008-03-10}}</ref> --> | Free for home use |- | [[DocFetcher]] | Cross-platform | Open source desktop search tool for Windows and Linux, based on [[Apache Lucene]] | [[Eclipse Public License]] |- | [[DtSearch|dtSearch Desktop]] | [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]] | | Proprietary (30 day trial) |- | [[Everything (software)|Everything]] | [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]] | Find files and folders by name instantly on NTFS volumes | Freeware |- | [[Google Desktop]] | [[Linux]], [[Mac OS]], [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]] | Integrates with the main Google search engine page. 5.9 Release now supports x64 systems. As of September 14, 2011, Google has discontinued this product. | Freeware |- | [[GNOME Storage]] | [[Linux]] | Open Source desktop search tool for Unix/Linux | GPL |- | [[InSight Desktop Search]] | [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]] | [[Metadata]]-based search utility | Freeware |- | [[ISYS Search Software]] | [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]] | ISYS:desktop search software. | Proprietary (14 day trial) |- | [[Locate32]] | [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]] | Graphical port of [[Unix]]'s locate & updatedb | [[BSD License]]<ref>According to http://www.softpedia.com/get/Internet/Servers/Database-Utils/Locate32.shtml</ref> |- | [[Lookeen]] | [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]] | Outlook Search Tool, with integrated Desktop Search | Proprietary (14 day trial) |- | [[Tracker (desktop search software)|Meta Tracker]] | [[Linux]], [[Unix]] | Open Source desktop search tool for Unix/Linux | GPL v2 <ref>According to [http://svn.gnome.org/viewvc/tracker/trunk/COPYING?view=markup COPYING] in SVN trunk.</ref> |- | [[Recoll]] | [[Linux]], [[Unix]] | Open Source desktop search tool for Unix/Linux | GPL <ref>According to [http://www.recoll.org].</ref> |- | [[Spotlight (software)|Spotlight]] | [[Mac OS]] | Found in [[Apple Inc.|Apple]] [[Mac OS X]] "[[Mac OS X v10.4|Tiger]]" and later OS X releases. | Proprietary |- | [[Strigi]] | [[Linux]], [[Unix]], [[Solaris (operating system)|Solaris]], [[Mac OS X]] and [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]] | Cross-platform open source desktop search engine | LGPL v2 <ref>According to [http://downloads.sourceforge.net/strigi/strigi-0.5.10.tar.bz2 COPYING] in version 0.5.10 tar.bz2 package.</ref> |- | [[Terrier Search Engine]] | [[Linux]], [[Mac OS]], [[Unix]] | Desktop search for Windows, Mac OS X (Tiger), Unix/Linux. | [[Mozilla Public License|MPL]] |- | [[Tropes Zoom]] | [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]] | Semantic Search Engine. | Freeware and commercial |- | [[Unity Dash]] | [[Linux]] | Part of [[Ubuntu Desktop]]. | GPL v3 |- | [[Windows Search]] | [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]] | Part of [[Windows Vista]] and later OSs. Available as [[Windows Desktop Search]] for [[Windows XP]] and [[Windows Server 2003|Server 2003]]. Does not support indexing UNC paths on x64 systems. | Proprietary, freeware |}
=== Usenet ===
<!-- Please do not add weblinks or examples which do not have Wikipedia articles --> * [[Google Groups]] (formerly [[Deja News]])
== Based on == === Google ===
<!-- Please do not add weblinks or examples which do not have Wikipedia articles --> * [[AOL|AOL Search]] * [[CompuServe|CompuServe Search]] * [[Groovle]] * [[MySpace|MySpace Search]] * [[Netscape]] * [[Ripple (charitable organisation)|Ripple]]
=== Yahoo! === <!-- Please do not add weblinks or examples which do not have Wikipedia articles --> * [[AltaVista]] * [[Ecocho]] * [[Everyclick]] (formerly based on Ask.com) * [[Forestle]] (an ecologically motivated site supporting sustainable rain forests - formerly based on Google) * [[GoodSearch]] * [[Rectifi]]
=== Bing===
<!-- Please do not add weblinks or examples which do not have Wikipedia articles --> * [[A9.com]] * [[Alexa Internet]] * [[Ciao (website)|Ciao!]] * [[Facebook]] * [[Ms. Dewey]] * [[Yahoo! Search]]
=== Ask.com ===
<!-- Please do not add weblinks or examples which do not have Wikipedia articles --> * [[Hakia]] (semantic search) * [[iWon]] * [[Lycos]] * [[Teoma]]
== Defunct or acquired search engines ==
<!-- Please do not add weblinks or examples which do not have Wikipedia articles --> <!-- alphabetical order please --> * [[AlltheWeb]] * [[Brainboost]] (Public engine no longer exists, acquired by [[Answers.com|Answers, Inc.]]) * [[BRS/Search]] (now [[OpenText]] Livelink ECM Discovery Server) * [[Btjunkie]] * [[Cuil]] * [[ChunkIt!]] (now "yolink!") (Public engine no longer exists) * [[Direct Hit Technologies]] (acquired by [[Ask Jeeves]] in January, 2000) * [[Google Answers]] * [[IBM STAIRS]] * [[Infoseek]] * [[Inktomi (company)|Inktomi]] * [[Kartoo]] * [[LeapFish]] (Public engine no longer exists) * [[Lotus Magellan]] * [[MetaLib]] (Public engine no longer exists) * [[mozDex]] (No longer exists) * [[Myriad Search]] (No longer exists) * [[Overture.com]] (formerly GoTo.com, now [[Yahoo! Search Marketing]]) * [[PubSub Concepts|PubSub]] * [[RetrievalWare]] (acquired by [[Fast Search & Transfer]] and now owned by [[Microsoft]]) * [[Scroogle]] (Google Scraper) * [[Singingfish]] * [[Speechbot]] * [[Sphere (Website)|Sphere]] * [[Tafiti]] * [[Yebol]] * [[Wikia Search]] * [[WiseNut]] * [[World Wide Web Worm]]
